__construct.name: __construct

get.name: get
get.summary: Returns the note with its url, start and end date of publication.

getAll.name: getAll
getAll.summary: Returns all the notes of type 'pages'.

getByUrl.name: getByUrl
getByUrl.summary: If the given url correspond to a published note returns the id.

delete.name: delete
delete.summary: Deletes the given note and unpublish it if published.

setUrl.name: setUrl
setUrl.summary: Inserts the url for the note if it doesn't exist a published note with the same url or update the url of the given note.

removeUrl.name: removeUrl
removeUrl.summary: Removes the url corresponding to the given id_note from bbn_notes_url.

getEvent.name: getEvent
getEvent.summary: Returns the object event of the given note.

updateEvent.name: updateEvent
updateEvent.summary: Updates the event relative to the given note.

getStart.name: getStart
getStart.summary: If an event linked to the note exists it returns the start date.

getEnd.name: getEnd
getEnd.summary: If  an event linked to the note exists it returns the end date.

setEvent.name: setEvent
setEvent.summary: Inserts in bbn_events and bbn_notes_events the information relative to the publication of the given note.

getFull.name: getFull
getFull.summary: Returns all notes that has a link with bbn_events.

getFullPublished.name: getFullPublished
getFullPublished.summary: Returns an array containing all the published notes.

isPublished.name: isPublished
isPublished.summary: If the note has a corresponding event in bbn_events and the date of start is before now,
isPublished.description: and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

description_parts.content: and the date of end if isset is after now and the note has an url it returns true

publish.name: publish

unpublish.name: unpublish

test.name: test
test.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: test
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

check.name: check
check.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

parent.name: check
parent.summary: Checks whether the error property has been set (so an error happened).

log.name: log

parent.name: log

__call.name: __call

parent.name: __call

exists.name: exists

getFields.name: getFields
getFields.summary: Returns the fields of the main table.

insert.name: insert
insert.summary: Inserts a new row in the table.

update.name: update
update.summary: Updates a single row in the table through its id.

select.name: select
select.summary: Retrieves a row from the table through its id.

selectAll.name: selectAll
selectAll.summary: Returns an array of rows from the table for the given conditions.
